---
title: "Full History Data Extraction"
author: "Harry Zhong"
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
source("packages.R")
```

```{r}
files <- list.files(paste0(here(), "/data/full_history_data"), pattern = "*.json", full.names = TRUE)

data <- lapply(files, function(x) {
  data <- fromJSON(x, flatten = TRUE)
  as.data.frame(data)
})

names(data) <- files %>%
  basename() %>%
  gsub(".json", "", .)

list2env(data, envir = .GlobalEnv)
```
